scripts.pages:build-cf: opennextjs-cloudflare build && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/assets/ && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/assets/_worker.js && echo '!node_modules' > .open-next/assets/.gitignore && echo '{"version":1,"include":["/*"],"exclude":["/_next/static/*","/favicon.ico","/*.png","/*.jpg"]}' > .open-next/assets/_routes.json
scripts.preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages dev .open-next/assets
scripts.deploy: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy .open-next/assets
